data.content:
noun
or garotte , pl -rotes or -rottes
[count] :a device (such as a piece of wire with a handle at each end) that is used to strangle someone
verb
or garotte -rotes or -rottes; -roted or -rotted; -roting or -rotting
[+ obj] :to strangle (someone) with a garrote
The victim was garroted.
